Welcome to PIONER's documentation!
==================================

**PIONER** is a Python library that provides easy access to perform 
experiments using  

**PIONER Lab** (Platform for Integrated Operative Nano Experiments and Research)   

It offers:  

* user-friendly application for standard nanocalorimetry (ultra-fast chip calorimetry) experiments
* simple and intuitive API for complex in-situ experiments 

.. note::
   This project is under active development.
